entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 06:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
